title: Tanner Foust!
description:
Tanner Foust is a racing driver, stunt driver, and television host. He's competed in drifting and time attack but currently focuses on rally cross, racing for Volkswagen. He's had multiple podium placements, national championships, and world records across these disciplines. If it has wheels, he can drive it. We talk to him about rally cross, jumping trucks a few hundred feet, stunt driving on "Ford vs Ferrari", other stunt jobs he's done, and flying planes. 

@tannerfoust
